009package Point_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015/**
016 * Does the same as {@link Raise_Contrast} but uses the one-dimensional
017 * pixel array to read and writes pixel values. Should be fast.
018 * @author WB
019 */
020public class Raise_Contrast_Fast implements PlugInFilter {
021
022        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus img) {
023                return DOES_8G;
024        }
025        
026        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
027                // ip is assumed to be of type ByteProcessor
028                byte[] pixels = (byte[]) ip.getPixels();
029                for (int i = 0; i < pixels.length; i++) {
030                        int a = 0xFF & pixels[i];
031                        int b = (int) (a * 1.5 + 0.5);
032                        if (b > 255)
033                                b = 255;
034                        pixels[i] = (byte) (0xFF & b);
035                }
036        }
037}
